Comments_List: I built a foundational sense of grammar and vocabulary

Gl Deniz worked to create a constructive and inviting atmosphere in class. She did a fantastic job in balancing a wide variety of media and pedagogical approaches in our class' structure. The only weakness that comes to mind is the textbook which lacks sufficient information/explication in English. Its reliance on Turkish can be confusing for beginner students.
Definitely, I would recommend this course to another student. The instructor was deeply invested in the course and our individual progress.
